title: Jahresberichte Der Deutschen Gesellschaft (Annual Reports of The German Society) 1898-1907

subject: Charities | German Americans | German American women | Societies | Women--Societies and clubs | Women in charitable work | Immigrants | Immigrants--Housing | Immigrants--Education | English language--Study and teaching--Foreign speakers | Labor movement | Social service | Public welfare | Child welfare | Food relief
spatial: Philadelphia (Pa.) | 611 Spring Garden Street, Philadelphia, PA
description: Collected and bound edition of annual reports of the German Society of Pennsylvania from 1898-1907, including yearly information on activities of various committees. Beginning in 1901, each report also includes information on the activities of the Women's Auxiliary (Frauen-Hilfsverein). Reports are written in German and include a short abstract in English.
